name: babel-spiffing
description: Thanks to [the babel plugin guide](https://github.com/jamiebuilds/babel-handbook/blob/master/translations/en/plugin-handbook.md#toc-writing-your-first-babel-plugin) and [if php were british](https://getpostcookie.com/blog/if-php-were-british), as well as [postcss-spiffing](https://github.com/hashanp/postcss-spiffing) for inspiration.
